text: Showed up at 2pm on a day it was supposed to be open, and the truck was nowhere to be found. Emailed them and there was no response either.

The highlight of my visit was definitely the dry-aged beef burger—it was incredibly flavorful, juicy, and cooked to perfection. You can really taste the quality and depth that comes from the dry-aging process. This food truck experience completely changed the way I see street food—delicious, high-quality, and full of character. I’ll definitely be coming back for more!

Best burgers in Singapore hands down!
Just check their Instagram beforehand to see if they’ll be there to avoid disappointment.
